Class Resource

java.lang.Object
dev.goldmensch.fluava.Resource
public class Resource extends Object

A resource is a layered representation of one or more fluent files.

Every method of this class is guaranteed to never throw an exception or return null. If a key looked for isn't found, then an empty message is returned which just return the messages key.
